snippet.title: Adelaide Hills wins national food award
snippet.content:
THE beautiful Adelaide Hills food bowl is officially Australia's most outstanding region. The coveted title was bestowed on the state's treasured zone at the national delicious. Produce Awards on Monday night. At a ceremony hosted in Melbourne by delicious. senior editor Matt Preston the awards effectively delivered national respect to 16 food producers. An on-trend new award, for Outstanding Native Producer, went to pioneer SA couple Warren and Ewa Jones, of Tumbeela Native Bushfoods, in Balhannah. One newcomer to the Adelaide Hills says he is not surprised by the accolades. Oliver Edwards, who stepped in as head chef at the Summertown Aristologist restaurant about two months ago, says he was drawn to the area "because those buzz words, local sustainable food and true connections with the producers, are a reality here".
Other Stories
"The menu writes itself, based on what we have around us," said the chef whose team, renowned for celebrating Hills produce, makes everything on site from scratch, including bread, butter and charcuterie. Other SA winners include gold medallists Hindmarsh Valley Dairy for its Bo Peep Sheep's Milk Cheese, Ngeringa Vineyards for its biodynamic mixed salad leaves and Mayura Station, for its full-blood Wagyu beef. 2017 delicious. Produce awards FROM THE DAIRY TROPHY WINNER Cedar Street Cheeserie A Love Supreme FROM THE DAIRY GOLD MEDALLISTS High Valley Mudgee Cheese Co Fetta Hindmarsh Valley Dairy Bo Peep Sheep's Milk Cheese (SA) Holy Goat Nectar Cheese Pyengana Dairy Company 12+ Months Tasty Cheddar Schulz Organic Farms Organic Full Cream Milk FROM THE EARTH TROPHY WINNER Randall Organic Rice Koshihikari FROM THE EARTH Alpine Strawberries Pretty Produce Leaf Mix and Edible Flowers The Fermentary Fig and Ginger Water Kefir The Lime Caviar Company Finger Limes Transition Farm Minutina (Leafy Greens) Trewhella Farm Biodynamic 'Brigitte' Blueberries Wellington Apiary Leatherwood Pure Tasmanian Honey Weston Farm Smoked Paprika FROM THE PADDOCK TROPHY WINNER Piccolo Farm Pastured Quail FROM THE PADDOCK GOLD MEDALLISTS Camden Valley Veal Rose Veal Mayura Station Full-Blood Wagyu beef (SA) Moorlands Biodynamic Lamb Biodynamic Texel Lamb Papanui Open Range Eggs Springfield Deer Farm Venison Sher Wagyu F1 Black Label Wagyu U Goose Free Range Whole Dressed Goose Warialda Beef Belted Galloway Beef FROM THE SEA TROPHY WINNER Richard Hamilton Spanner Crab FROM THE SEA GOLD MEDALLISTS SeaBounty Australian blue Mussels South Coast Sea Urchins Ozi Uni Sea Urchin Roe Tathra Oysters Nelson Lake 5 Year Old Sydney rock oysters BEST NEW PRODUCT TROPHY WINNER Camden Valley Veal Rose Veal PRODUCER OF THE YEAR TROPHY WINNER Ocean Grown Abalone Ranched Greenlip Abalone IN THE BOTTLE, TROPHY WINNER MAiDENii Classic Vermouth OUTSTANDING DESIGN TROPHY WINNER Cone 11 Ceramics OUTSTANDING FARMERS' MARKET TROPHY WINNER Harvest Launceston Community Farmers' Market, TAS OUTSTANDING FARMERS' MARKET FINALISTS Albany Farmers Market, WA SAGE Farmers Market Moruya, NSW Willunga Farmers Market, SA OUTSTANDING REGION,
